WorkItem.Description:
It is impossible to equip two Signet of Bridenbrad rings. 
 
They are a  quest item that are soul bound.  You  will only have one. 
 
I was looking to optimize for +Hit while I gear my tank up.  It presented the option of having the same ring in both slots. 
 
Quest items should be treated like Unique equip items.
 
This is on the web based version running on Mac OSX 10.5.7
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer displayed two rings of the same type, even though they are soul bound quest rewards

Comments.Message:
Right click > Edit > Check Unique.
We can't just mark all quest rewards as unique, because not all are truly unique.
